title: Sold 1937 San Diego Padres postcard featuring Ted Williams
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: Sold 1937 San Diego Padres postcard featuring Ted Williams
posts.post_content:
For Sale: 1937 San Diego Padres postcard featuring Ted Williams. Grade is an SGC 30 due to minor back damage. Front is problem-free. Easily the rarest rookie-era card of Williams. SOLD OBO. PM with questions or to discuss

Thanks

Chris
Damn Chris!  Thought that would be in your forever collection!  Congrats on the quick sale!
Now that is so cool.   Wish I checked the BST a little sooner today.
wow. that is cool. congrats on the sale.
Congrats to the new owner. I was very sad to let this one go about 10 years ago now, hopefully, goes to a good home with someone who will cherish it as I once did.
